snippet.title: Daedalus Demise - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Game available now: https://timkrief.itch.io/daedalus-demise

An Endless Adventure Awaits You

In Daedalus Demise you're trapped in an endless maze. You can only go deeper into this dungeon, in the hope of finding a way out. Try to reach the lowest floor to survive!

This game was made in a 35-hour work week for the One Week Crunchless Challenge in February 2021. See the video about the challenge here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1cK9YffEyu0

----------
Find me online: http://links.timkrief.com
----------
All my projects here are proudly made using free/libre open source software:
- Games made using Godot Engine, Blender, Audacity, Gimp etc.
- Videos made using Olive video editor
On a computer that runs thanks to GNU/Linux, Debian, Ubuntu, Gnome and other FLOSS tools.
----------
